summary: A melancholy poet reflects on three women he loved and lost in the past: a mechanical performing doll, a Venetian courtesan, and the consumptive daughter of a celebrated composer.
cast: Moira Shearer|Ludmilla Tchérina|Ann Ayars|Pamela Brown|Léonide Massine|Robert Helpmann|Frederick Ashton|Mogens Wieth|Robert Rounseville|Lionel Harris|Philip Leaver|Meinhart Maur|Edmond Audran|Thomas Beecham|Alan Carter|Elizabeth Christie|John Ford|Richard Golding|Barry Lowe|Arthur Skinner
title: Los cuentos de Hoffman
